shopping.name: Chengdu Taikoo Li (成都太古里)
shopping.notes: Evening visit planned. Trendy upscale shopping mall with international fashion brands (Apple Store, Adidas, CROCS, Speed Sketch). Perfect for INFJ aesthetic - modern architecture, less crowded in evening. Accessible via Chunxi Road Metro Station B exit (170m walk). Mix of luxury boutiques and lifestyle stores.

shopping.name: POP MART Global Flagship Store (泡泡玛特全球旗舰店)
shopping.location: 南京东路299号宏伊国际广场F1层
shopping.notes: THE flagship store for Popmart in Shanghai! Located on Nanjing Road Pedestrian Street. Must-visit for cute collectible toys and blind boxes. INFJ-friendly with aesthetic display and collectible hunting experience. Near hotel (SK Hotel on Nanjing Road).

shopping.name: Tianzifang (田子坊)
shopping.notes: INFJ paradise - narrow alleyways with indie boutiques, artisan crafts, vintage clothing, and creative design stores. Less touristy than Nanjing Road. Perfect for finding unique fashion pieces and handmade items. Cozy cafe atmosphere. Allow 2-3 hours to explore.

shopping.name: Shanghai Xintiandi (上海新天地)
shopping.location: 太仓路181弄6-15号 (Huangpi South Road Metro)
shopping.notes: Trendy blend of historic Shikumen architecture and modern boutiques. High-end fashion brands mixed with niche designer stores. INFJ-friendly with intimate lanes and sophisticated atmosphere. Good for fashion clothing shopping as requested.

shopping.name: POP MART K11 Art Mall Store (泡泡玛特K11店)
shopping.notes: Popmart store inside K11 Art Mall - perfect combination of cute toys + art gallery atmosphere. INFJ dream venue. K11 itself is worth exploring for contemporary art installations while shopping. Located in French Concession area.

shopping.name: Nanjing Road Shopping Street (南京路步行街)
shopping.notes: Final day fashion shopping. Major brands and department stores. Your hotel (SK Hotel) is ON Nanjing Road, so super convenient for last-minute shopping before Beijing flight. Multiple Popmart stores nearby including World Trade flagship.

shopping.name: 798 Art District (798艺术区)
shopping.notes: INFJ heaven - converted factory complex with avant-garde galleries, indie design boutiques, and artisan shops. Perfect for unique fashion finds and artistic souvenirs. Trendy, niche, non-mainstream. Combine with attractions visit. Multiple plazas: Bauhaus Square, Center Square, Revival Square.

shopping.name: Nanluoguxiang (南锣鼓巷)
shopping.location: 南锣鼓巷 (Nanluoguxiang Metro Exit E)
shopping.notes: Historic hutong alley with indie boutiques, vintage clothing, handmade crafts, and quirky gift shops. INFJ-friendly with small-scale intimate shops. Less commercial than main streets. Good for unique fashion accessories and local designer items.

shopping.name: Sanlitun Taikoo Li (三里屯太古里)
shopping.location: 三里屯路11、19号院 (Gongti Metro Exit D, 240m walk)
shopping.notes: Beijing's trendiest shopping area - mix of international luxury brands and local designer boutiques. North Zone (三里屯太古里北区) and South Zone. Apple Store landmark. Perfect for fashion clothing shopping. Younger, hipper vibe than other malls. Evening atmosphere is vibrant.

shopping.name: POP MART Sanlitun Store (泡泡玛特三里屯太古里南区店)
shopping.notes: Popmart flagship in Sanlitun Taikoo Li South Zone basement. Prime location in trendy area. Good selection of limited editions and exclusives. Visit after shopping at Sanlitun.

shopping.name: POP MART Zhongguancun Store (泡泡玛特中关村壹号店)
shopping.location: 丹棱街甲1号中关村领展广场B1层
shopping.notes: Flagship store near university district (Zhongguancun). Convenient if rental apartment is in Haidian/university area. Good for last-minute Popmart shopping. Located in Zhongguancun Shopping Mall basement - modern tech/student area.

chengdu.name: Chengdu Taikoo Li
chengdu.highlights: International fashion brands, modern architecture, upscale boutiques

shanghai.name: POP MART Global Flagship (Nanjing Road)
shanghai.highlights: Largest Popmart store globally, exclusive items

shanghai.name: Tianzifang
shanghai.highlights: Indie boutiques, artisan crafts, vintage clothing
shanghai.best_for: Unique fashion, handmade items, INFJ aesthetic

shanghai.name: Nanjing Road Pedestrian Street
shanghai.highlights: Department stores, major brands, multiple Popmart locations

beijing.name: Sanlitun Taikoo Li
beijing.highlights: Beijing's hippest shopping area, mix of luxury and local designers
beijing.best_for: Fashion clothing, trendy items, nightlife area

beijing.name: 798 Art District
beijing.highlights: Converted factory with galleries and indie boutiques
beijing.best_for: Artistic souvenirs, unique fashion, INFJ heaven

beijing.name: Nanluoguxiang
beijing.highlights: Small indie shops in traditional alleyway
beijing.best_for: Vintage finds, handmade crafts, intimate shopping

beijing.name: Zhongguancun (near universities)
beijing.best_for: Convenient if staying in Haidian area

shanghai: POP MART World Trade Store (上海世茂旗舰店) - Nanjing Road 829
POP MART Lujiazui Store (正大广场店) - Lujiazui West Road 168, 5F
POP MART Jing'an Kerry Centre (静安嘉里中心店) - B1 level
beijing: POP MART apm Store (北京apm店) - Wangfujing Street 138, B1
POP MART Wangfujing Department Store (王府井百货店) - Robot store, 1F
POP MART Guomao Store (国贸商城店) - Jianguomen Outer Street 1, North Zone B level
POP MART Xidan Joy City (西单大悦城店) - Xidan North Street 131, 1F
POP MART Wudaokou (五道口购物中心店) - Near university area

notes: Shopping schedule excludes shopping budget from €1000 trip budget per user request (购物需求不大). Focused on INFJ-friendly trendy/niche areas: artsy districts (Tianzifang, 798), upscale boutique areas (Xintiandi, Sanlitun Taikoo Li), and Popmart flagship stores. Avoided overwhelming shopping days - only 5 shopping days total across 21-day trip. Shanghai has most shopping (Days 5+7) as requested for fashion/clothing. Beijing options provided for multiple areas since rental apartment location TBD - Sanlitun (trendy central), Nanluoguxiang (historic), 798 (artsy), Zhongguancun (university district). All Popmart stores verified via Gaode Maps POI search. Cost estimates are budget allocations in USD, not fixed prices. Shopping areas are walkable and well-connected to metro. Tianzifang and 798 are particularly INFJ-suited with quiet, artistic, small-scale boutique atmosphere.
